C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

args:
. /opt/bitnami/scripts/geode-env.sh
. /opt/bitnami/scripts/libgeode.sh
declare -a locators
read -r -a locators <<< "$(tr ',;' ' ' <<< "${GEODE_LOCATORS/%,/}")"
for l in "${locators[@]}"; do
    geode_wait_for_locator_connection "$l" "${GEODE_SECURITY_USERNAME:-}" "${GEODE_SECURITY_PASSWORD:-}"
done
initContainers.name: wait-for-locators
